meta.article_title: April 4, 2022 - If You Get Caught Out of Position, Either You Made a Mistake or Your Opponent Did Something Great

causes_communes: Previous shot left them off balance or out of position

debutant: Follow through back into position after a forehand shot
Use weight on the left foot to immediately and smoothly push yourself back into position

exercices_complementaires.description: Step around the backhand, follow through onto your left foot, and use weight to push yourself back into position.

metriques_progression: Time to recover from off-balance shots
erreurs_a_eviter: Stepping around too early, not recovering properly
